response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,500,000 to you. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a price tailored to reflect your needs and budget. Considering the product's worth and your anticipated use, I propose a price of $1,400,000. This offer allows us to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction while maintaining a fair market value. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1400000}
